name: Bluetooth Devices Monitor
description: Monitors and displays information about Bluetooth devices connected to your computer.

name: Browser Add-ons Viewer
description: Displays a list of installed add-ons, extensions, and plugins for Internet Explorer, Firefox, Chrome, and other browsers.

name: Browser Downloads Viewer
description: Shows the list of files downloaded by your web browsers (Internet Explorer, Firefox, Chrome, etc.).

name: Browsing History Viewer
description: Allows you to view the browsing history of various web browsers like Chrome, Firefox, and Internet Explorer.

name: Bulk File Changer
description: Enables you to make a wide range of modifications on multiple files at once.

name: BulletsPassView
description: Reveals the passwords hidden behind asterisk ('*****') characters in password text-boxes.

name: Chrome Cache View
description: Displays the list of cached files stored by the Google Chrome browser.

name: Chrome Cookies View
description: View the list of all cookies stored by the Google Chrome Web browser.

name: Chrome History View
description: Reads and displays the browsing history from the Google Chrome browser.

name: ChromePass
description: Recovers usernames and passwords stored by the Google Chrome Web browser.

name: CleanAfterMe
description: Allows you to easily clean unwanted files and registry entries on your system.

name: Clipboard Icon Changer
description: Changes the tray icon when there is text in the clipboard.

name: ControlMyMonitor
description: Allows you to view and modify the settings of your monitor (brightness, contrast, etc.) directly from your desktop.

name: Country Traceroute
description: Performs a traceroute command and displays the geographical location of each router found on the path.

name: CurrPorts
description: Displays the list of all currently opened TCP/IP and UDP ports on your local computer.

name: CProcess
description: Displays detailed information about processes running on your system.

name: Credentials File View
description: Decrypts and displays the content of Credentials files (.crd) created by the Windows Credential Manager.

name: CSVFileView
description: Opens and views comma-separated value (.csv) files in a table format.

name: Custom Explorer Toolbar
description: Allows you to add, remove, and modify the toolbar buttons in Windows Explorer.

name: Data Protection Decryptor
description: Decrypts files protected with Windows Data Protection API (DPAPI).

name: DeviceIoView
description: Displays all disk and network activity occurring on your system.

name: Device Manager View
description: A simple alternative to the standard Windows Device Manager.

name: Dialupass
description: Recovers dial-up and VPN passwords stored by Windows.

name: DiskCountersView
description: Displays the system's disk counters, showing read/write activity.

name: DiskSmartView
description: Retrieves and displays the S.M.A.R.T. (Self-Monitoring, Analysis and Reporting Technology) information of your hard drives.

name: DLL Export Viewer
description: Lists the exported functions of DLL files.

name: DNS Data View
description: Monitors and displays DNS queries sent from your system.

name: DNSQuerySniffer
description: Sniffs the DNS queries sent on your system and displays them.

name: Domain Hosting View
description: Finds the hosting company and other information for a given domain.

name: .NET Resources Extract
description: Extracts embedded resources from .NET applications.

name: DownTester
description: Tests if a website is down by sending HTTP requests.

name: DriveLetterView
description: Displays the list of all drive letters in your system, including hidden and unused ones.

name: DriverView
description: Lists all device drivers currently loaded on your system.

name: Edge Cookies View
description: View the list of all cookies stored by the Microsoft Edge Web browser.

name: EncryptedRegView
description: Allows you to view the content of encrypted Registry values.

name: ESE Database View
description: Allows you to open and view the content of Extensible Storage Engine (ESE) database files (.edb).

name: Event Log Channels View
description: Displays the list of all event log channels, including the number of events in each channel.

name: Event Log Sources View
description: Displays the list of all event log sources registered on your local computer.

name: Executed Programs List
description: Displays the list of recently executed programs on your system.

name: Exif Data View
description: Views the Exif data stored inside image files.

name: FastResolver
description: Quickly resolves hostnames to IP addresses.

name: Favicon Viewer
description: Extracts and displays the favicons of websites from browser cache.

name: Facebook Cache View
description: Views the cached files of the Facebook website stored in your browser.

name: File Access Error View
description: Displays a list of file access errors that occurred on your system.

name: File Activity Watch
description: Monitors and displays the activity of files on your system in real-time.

name: FileTypesMan
description: An alternative to the 'File Types' tab in the Folder Options of Windows. It displays the list of all registered file extensions and types.

name: Firefox Downloads View
description: Shows the list of files downloaded by the Mozilla Firefox web browser.

name: Firmware Tables View
description: Displays the content of the BIOS firmware tables (SMBIOS, ACPI, etc.).

name: Flash Cookies View
description: Views the local shared objects (Flash cookies) stored by Adobe Flash Player.

name: FolderChangesView
description: Monitors the changes made in the folders you choose, and displays a log of all create, modify, and delete operations.

description: Allows you to modify the last modified/created/accessed time of folders.

name: FullEventLogView
description: Displays detailed information about all events in the Windows event logs.

name: GDIView
description: Displays the list of GDI handles opened by each process.

description: Displays the properties of windows and controls in running applications.

name: HandleCountersView
description: Displays the system's handle counters, showing the number of open handles for each type.

name: HashMyFiles
description: Calculates the MD5, SHA1, CRC32 and other hash values of files.

name: HeapMemView

name: LoadedDllsView
